K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:213b-1: su r'u ba na ma dha ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:213b-3: su r'u pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-2: na ma: su r'u p'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-8: pra su ru pra su ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-11: sam bha ra sam bha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-15: sarba pre ta n'ama sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-16: gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i zan la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te lag pa g-yon pas se gol gyi sgra lan gsum du byas nas yi dvags thams cad la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-17: 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-19: glags lta ba rnams dengs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i yi dvags rnams la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-22: zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-23: de ltar na yi dvags thams cad la 'bras bre bo che re re'i bza' ba so sor byin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-25: skye ba nas skye bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-30: phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214a-31: tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214b-0: myur du bla @214b na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214b-1: shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-033:214b-2: gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
